description: Unique identifier for each Dose Era record.
comment: Primary Key for the DOSE_ERA table.

description: Identifier of the Person to whom the Dose Era applies.
Concept identifier representing the specific drug ingredient.
comment: Foreign Key: CONCEPT.concept_id (Domain: Drug; Concept Class: Ingredient).

description: Concept identifier representing the unit of the drug ingredient dosage.
Numeric value representing the dosage of the drug ingredient.
Date the Person started the specific dosage, with at least a 30-day persistence window since prior exposure.
comment: Start date of continuous dose era.

description: Date the Person was no longer exposed to the specific dosage. An era ends if there are 31 days or more between dosage records.
comment: End date of continuous dose era.
